commands.name: az pipelines build definition list
commands.syntax:
az pipelines build definition list [--detect {false, true}]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--org]
                                   [--project]
                                   [--repository]
                                   [--repository-type {bitbucket, git, github, githubenterprise, svn, tfsgit, tfsversioncontrol}]
                                   [--top]

commands.name: az pipelines build definition show
commands.summary: Get the details of a build definition.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines build definition show [--detect {false, true}]
                                   [--id]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--open]
                                   [--org]
                                   [--project]
